name: 職涯管理與諮詢研究
comment: 如果本校大三大四學生想修此全英語授課課程，請找任課教師拿授權碼。
description: The purpose of this course is to provide students with the tools to be an effective career counselor, with the knowledge of the types and sources of occupational and educational information available, and how those resources can be used in the career counseling and decision making process. In that context, the dynamics of the changing labor market and its impact on personal, social, economic, occupational, and educational aspects of individuals and society will be studied. In addition, the importance of the needs of culturally diverse and special populations, the electronic delivery of occupational and educational information, and various career decision making theories will be discussed.
goals: Understanding history, philosophy, and trends in career counseling
Obtaining skills in career counseling processes, techniques and resources including those applicable to specific populations
Learning the knowledge of career, vocational, educational, and labor market information resources, visual and print media, and computer-based career information systems
Understanding career development program planning, organization, implementation, administration, and evaluation
Understanding career development theories and decision-making models
Learning roles, functions, and credentials of career counselors in a variety of settings and in relation to other professionals
Understanding interrelationships among work, family, and other life roles and factors including multicultural and gender issues as related to career development
Acknowledging the implications of sociocultural, demographic, and lifestyle diversity relevant to career counseling
Applying assessment instruments, techniques, and intervention strategies relevant to career development, career planning and decision-making, and career counseling programs
10.　Obtaining skills in computer based career development applications and strategies, including computer-assisted career guidance systems
11.　Understanding current ethical and legal issues which affect the practice of career counseling

grading.note: Critically review and critique 2 different websites that could be useful in facilitating the career decision process. The purpose of this assignment is to get students to identify different career-oriented websites and to learn how to evaluate the overall quality of information on the websites. All website reviews should include the following: website name, website address, name of the website sponsor/developer, overview of the website, summary of strengthens and weaknesses of websites, and a brief description of the most appropriate setting for using this website.
You will submit your cover letter, resume and biography as your final exam.
